docs.snippet: Four games deep in the Stanley Cup Final, all that's clear is just how little separates the Chicago Blackhawks and the Tampa Bay Lightning....

docs.snippet: Dean Potter jumped. Graham Hunt followed. Potter’s longtime girlfriend snapped photographs. Then came confusion, hope and despair....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dean Potter jumped. Graham Hunt followed. Potter’s longtime girlfriend snapped photographs. Then came confusion, hope and despair.
docs.abstract: Jen Rapp, longtime girlfriend of late professional climber and jumper Dean Potter, recalls the moments prior to his death in a base jumping accident at Yosemite National Park, along with his apprentice and flying partner Graham Hunt.
